SAINT.Name: Forefeast of the Meeting of the Lord
On this day we observe the Meeting of our Lord, God, and Saviour Jesus Christ
Martyr Tryphon of Campsada near Apamea in Syria (+250)
Venerable Peter of Galatia, the Hermit, near Antioch in Syria (+429)
Venerable Vendimianus, the Hermit of Bithynia (+c.512)
Martyrs Perpetua, a woman of Carthage, and the Catechumens: Saturus, Revocatus, Saturninus, Secundulus, Felicita (+c.202-203)
Saint Bridget of Ireland (523)
Holy Hierarch Basil, Archbishop of Thessalonica
Martyr Anastasius
New Martyr Peter Skipetrov (+1918)
St Tryphon, Protecteur des jardins
Sts Saturus, Saturnin, Secondus, Revocat, Perpetue et Felicite
St Pierre de Galatie
St Bendenianos (ou Bendimien) du Mont St Auxence
Sts David, Syméon et Georges de Mytilène
St Basile le Confesseur, Evêque de Thessalonique
St Nil le Nouveau à Damas
St Timothée le Confesseur
St Theion
St Carion
St Néomartyr Anastase à Nauplie
St Tryphon de Pechenga et Kola
Ste Brigitte de Kildare
Предпразднство Сретения Господня. Мч. Трифона (250)
Сщмч. Николая пресвитера (1938)
Мц. Перпетуи, мчч. Сатира, Ревоката, Саторнила, Секунда и мц. Филицитаты (202-203)
Прп. Петра Галатийского (429)
Прп. Вендимиана, пустынника Вифинийского (ок. 512)
